short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL to QR code developed for easy transfer of sites from Computer to mobile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The QRL Extension has been launched to scan the links on your PC to your mobile and check it on the move. This is to make your life easy and quite accessible to the links which you are viewing on your big screen. Instead of copying the link, pasting, and sending, you just scan it without any obstacle and send. Here's to making life easy and smart!
